tier.item: 'I showed the money to the girls.' (Comrie 1982:99, 108)
'I showed the money to the girls.' (Comrie 1982:99, 108)
I showed the money to the girls.
Juan and María are killing me.
b. Nee wan maria maa-me ne-wa-qiini.
b. Nee wan maria maa-me ne-wa-qiini.
I am killing Juan and María.
